attributes.action: Limit Door to Door Sales to reasonable hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Limit the hours that door to door sales people can invade your property and hassle you on your own doorstep.

With the increasing use of the internet, consumers are quite capable of searching for products and services and should not be hassled on their days off or after a hard days work!

Allow calling only between the hours of 9am to 6pm on Weekdays and no calling on Saturdays or Sundays.
